titles.title: To amend the National Marine Sanctuaries Act to establish the National Marine Sanctuary Foundation to accept and use donations for the benefit of the National Marine Sanctuary System, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Fisheries Conservation, Wildlife and Oceans.

bill.summary: 5/9/2000--Introduced. Amends the National Marine Sanctuaries Act to establish as a charitable nonprofit corporation the National Marine Sanctuary Foundation to: (1) solicit and designate official sponsors of the national marine sanctuary program (program) or of any individual sanctuary; (2) authorize the manufacture, reproduction, or other use of program symbols; (3) create, market, and sell products to promote the program; and (4) solicit contributions for the manufacture, reproduction, or use of the program symbols.
